message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counteroffer at $90.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $92.

I'm glad we're still in the negotiation, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting this product. I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession, but I need to make a decent profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $98.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $96 for the product.

I can see you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $98. This is my final offer.
